answers.answer: Im 36weeks n have high blood pressure and preeclampsia too but dr hasnt given me an exact date to be induced yet. The anxiety is driving me crazy. He just said before 38 weeks so im hoping next week ill meet my baby:) i think about it 24/7!!!
I think about it all the time too! I will for sure set my date on Thursday but Dr has talked the 26th! I can't wait to meet my baby girl. =)
Im being induced the 30th. Cant wait

Im 37wks and I was suppose to be induced this week due to my high blood pressure. But I guess they changed it til im 39 wks. Not excited, and things might change again at next apt tmrw. Getting nervous that I dont have an exact date.
Getting induced on the 28th, so at 39 weeks.  I'm currently 37 wks, 4 days and holding out hope that she will come on her own!

question: I'm suppose to be induced at 37 weeks due to my preeclampsia symptoms and high blood pressure.. only 9 more days and I'm starting to feel very emotional this is my second baby =)
title: anyone else due april but being induced this month?
